attributes.action: Only give benifits to people born in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should only receive benefits if they were born in this country,we are seeing too many people immigrating to this country and claiming off our benefits,
the country they come from should be giving them benefits.
There will be alot more benefits to british citizens if this was enforced

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
